Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Houston in 1981...
Injured on 8/14/1983 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1986, off Jimmy Key (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1986, off Dave Righetti (ATL)...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Injured on 7/12/1986 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1988 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1988, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New York (N) on 6/2/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1989, hitting .478 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1989, hitting .364 with 11 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/9/1990 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1991, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1991, hitting .429 with 11 HR, 32 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/1/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1991, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1993, hitting .412 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1993, hitting .318 with 10 HR, 19 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 6/27/1993...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
